content:
$ npm run build

> superhero-nextjs@0.1.0 build
> next build

  ▲ Next.js 14.2.5

   Creating an optimized production build ...
 ✓ Compiled successfully

Failed to compile.

./src/app/layout.tsx
15:9  Error: Synchronous scripts should not be used. See: https://nextjs.org/docs/messages/no-sync-scripts  @next/next/no-sync-scripts


./src/components/FormattedMessage.tsx
49:45  Error: Component definition is missing display name  react/display-name
113:38  Error: React Hook "useMemo" is called conditionally. React Hooks must be called in the exact same order in every component render.  react-hooks/rules-of-hooks
247:35  Error: React Hook "useCallback" is called conditionally. React Hooks must be called in the exact same order in every component render.  react-hooks/rules-of-hooks
253:5  Error: React Hook "useEffect" is called conditionally. React Hooks must be called in the exact same order in every component render.  react-hooks/rules-of-hooks
459:12  Error: Component definition is missing display name  react/display-name

Your fix to FormattedMessage dramatically slowed down the app. 

Is there a way to fix the errors without changing the memo'izing much?
